title: Game Progress Route
content:
g options to respond with:

Just this once, I wish people would simply say hello. Jaheira, is it? I’m Tav, and I assure you none of this is necessary. You have to the count of five to let me go.

Choosing the second option will just make them push further. You’ll have the following options to respond with next:

Easy. Give me a chance to earn your trust. I saved your soldiers and this is the thanks I get? Could you at least explain to me why you’re doing this? Back off. Now.

It seems she is mai
